item.title: Turkish Embrace Crypto Stablecoins Like Tether (USDT) as Lira Slides
item.description: Turkish Embrace Crypto Stablecoins Like Tether (USDT) as Lira Slides The Turkish lira has been in a state of decline for several years. In the past year, the lira has lost about 50% of its value against the U.S. dollar. This has led to a surge in demand for crypto stablecoins in Turkey.
